item.title: Roblox: Ascender Incremental Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Ascender Incremental Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Ascender Incremental
  • How to Get More Ascender Incremental Codes

Ascender Incremental is an unpretentious time-killer where you will need to earn different types of points, such as Energy, Flame, Power, and many others. The main point of this Roblox game is to earn as many of these points as possible, and also to unlock more types of these points, aka stats.

To accelerate the process of earning points, you can use runes, which are quite difficult to obtain, so as an alternative you can redeem Ascender Incremental codes. Each of them will bring you unique rewards which will be no less useful than runes, for example, potion boosters, Robux Tokens, etc.

Updated March 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Redeem codes in Ascender Incremental to unlock helpful in-game boosts. These can assist in reaching new milestones more efficiently. Keeping track of updates ensures you stay ahead. Expired codes won’t work, so use them while they last.

All Ascender Incremental Codes

Working Ascender Incremental Codes

  • 100KVISITS - Redeem this code to get 50 Robux Tokens, and five elixirs of each type.
  • NotTooHidden - Redeem this code to get three elixirs of each type.
  • LZRVerify1 - Redeem this code to verify.

Expired Ascender Incremental Codes

There are currently no expired Ascender Incremental codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redeeming Ascender Incremental codes will bring more new features and enjoyment to your gameplay. The rewards will serve as a great boost for your progression and save you a lot of time, so don't neglect it.

How to Redeem Codes for Ascender Incremental

Redeeming Ascender Incremental codes will not take you long. As in most other Roblox games, the redemption option is located among the UI elements, but not in the most obvious place. So, use our guide to get there faster:

  • Launch Ascender Incremental .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the first one.
  • This will open the Store menu. In the lower section of the menu, you will see a bunch of buttons arranged in a row. Among them, interact with the last one.
  • This will take you to the redemption section. Here, paste one of the working codes from the list above into the input field.
  • Next and finally, press Enter to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Ascender Incremental Codes

If you haven't looked for Roblox codes before, the best advice is to search for them on the official pages of the game or its developers. These are the best places to find codes, and they are also the primary sources where they appear first.

  • Official Ascender Incremental Roblox group.
  • Official Ascender Incremental game page.
  • Official Ascender Incremental Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Clicker Simulator Codes (March 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Clicker Simulator Codes
  • How To Redeem Codes In Clicker Simulator
  • Clicker Simulator Tips and Tricks
  • Best Roblox Simulator Games Like Clicker Simulator
  • About the Clicker Simulator Developers

Clicker Simulator is an exciting Roblox game in which players can earn clicks by pressing on the screen. With these clicks, players can hatch, collect, and trade pets. Players can also ease their clicking journey by purchasing pets, buttons, or rebirthing. Climbing the leaderboard and becoming a Clicking God is the ultimate goal in this highly addictive game.

Roblox players can find active codes for Clicker Simulator below in this article. These codes can provide additional bonuses and rewards to enhance the gameplay experience, making the clicking adventure even more enjoyable. Get ready to embark on an exciting clicking journey, hatch legendary pets, and climb the leaderboard in Clicker Simulator.

Updated March 12, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: This guide has been updated to include all Clicker Simulator codes. Be sure to redeem them as they may expire at any time. Stay tuned and come back later.

All Clicker Simulator Codes

Active Clicker Simulator Codes

How To Redeem Codes In Clicker Simulator

Redeeming codes in Clicker Simulator is an easy task (just like in most other Roblox games), just follow the step-by-step instructions below:

  • Open Roblox and launch Clicker Simulator .
  • Find the menu icon on the main screen of the game.
  • Click on this icon.
  • Then find the blue Twitter icon.
  • Click on it.
  • Enter the offered code in the field that says "Enter code."

Clicker Simulator Tips and Tricks

Below players can find tips and tricks for Clicker Simulator :

  • Start by opening eggs, especially event ones, to get powerful pets.
  • Take advantage of the trading system and the trade world to quickly improve pets.
  • Rebirthing is essential for progress, providing more clicks and opportunities.
  • Use the pet index, achievements, and daily wheel spins for additional advantages and rewards.

Best Roblox Simulator Games Like Clicker Simulator

Finding new games like this one might take some time. Thankfully, players no longer need to waste their time searching for one. Below, they will find 5 great games like Clicker Simulator :

  • Weapon Fighting Simulator
  • Anime Catching Simulator
  • Noob Factory Simulator
  • Sword Fighters Simulator
  • Mining Simulator 2

About the Clicker Simulator Developers

Toya_Studio_ClickerSim, the developers of Clicker Simulator, often update the game to make it more interesting for players. They released this one in 2021, and currently have over 1 million members in their Roblox group. Toya_Studio_ClickerSim also has another interesting game called Warrior Simulator.

item.title: GTA Online: 10 Fastest Planes, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • The fastest plane in GTA Online is the Mammoth F-160 Raiju, with a top speed of 374 km/h, making it ideal for combat.
  • The Western Company Rogue ranks as the third-fastest plane in GTA Online, boasting a top speed of 353 km/h.
  • The Buckingham Pyro is the second-fastest plane in GTA Online, reaching a top speed of 358 km/h, perfect for exploration and missions.

GTA Online is the multiplayer mode of Grand Theft Auto 5 , one of the best-selling video games ever. Having a plane in GTA Online is essential for quickly traversing Los Santos, taking down enemy players, racing against friends, and causing chaos across the entire map.

Owning one or two fast planes in GTA Online can be very beneficial for preparing heists, completing cargo missions, traveling across the large map, and dealing with those annoying griefing players. In this ranking, we'll take a look at the fastest planes in GTA Online .

10 Western Company Besra

Based On The Northrop F-5

  • Top Speed - 304 km/h
  • Price - $1,150,000
  • Released - 1.16 SA Flight School Update

The Western Company Besra was one of the first planes added to GTA Online and is still one of the fastest after all these years, with a top speed of 304km/h. Its unique design takes inspiration from multiple real-life planes, such as the Northrop F-5, Casa C-101, and Aero L-39.

The Western Company Besra is an armored vehicle available for purchase from Elitas Travel for $1,150,000. It can withstand up to three homing missiles before being destroyed, providing players with more than enough time to escape from dangerous situations. The Besra can be used in races.

9 JoBuilt P-996 LAZER

Based On The F-16 Fighting Falcon

  • Top Speed - 318 km/h
  • Price - $6,500,000
  • Released - 1.41 Smuggler’s Run Update

The JoBuilt P-996 LAZER is a weaponized fighter jet that became available for purchase with the 1.41 Smuggler’s Run Update. Its top speed is around 318km/h (195 mph) and it can be purchased from Warstock Cache & Carry for the price of $6,500,000.

Taking inspiration from the General Dynamics F-16 Fighting Falcon, the JoBuilt P-996 LAZER has a classic "fighter jet" style and has the weapons to go with it. It is equipped with a powerful cannon and a missile launcher that can be fired with or without a lock-on. However, it is less armored than most planes and can only withstand two homing missiles.

8 P-45 Nokota

Based On The P-51 Mustang

  • Top Speed - 323 km/h
  • Price - $2,653,350
  • Released - 1.41 Smuggler’s Run Update

Inspired by one of the most famous aircraft ever, the North American P-51 Mustang, the P-45 Nokota adds a touch of elegance and history to GTA Online . With a top speed of around 313km/h, the P-45 Nokota is one of the quickest planes in GTA Online .

Players can buy the P-45 Nokota from Warstock Cache & Carry for $2,653,350. The P-45 is a weaponized vehicle equipped with cannons and a missile launcher. It is also well-armored, capable of withstanding up to three Homing Missiles. The P-45 Nokota can be used in races.

7 Buckingham Alpha-Z1

Based On The Reberry 3M1C1R

  • Top Speed - 324 km/h
  • Price - $2,121,350
  • Released - 1.41 Smuggler’s Run Update

Taking inspiration from the Reberry 3M1C1R, the Buckingham Alpha-Z1 is one of the sleekest and smallest planes in GTA Online , allowing players to perform crazy tricks and land safely in even the tightest locations. Buckingham Alpha-Z1 has a top speed of 324 km/h (201 mph).

Its small size and design combined with its high speed makes the Buckingham Alpha-Z1 one of the most maneuverable planes in this ranking. Players can purchase the Buckingham Alpha-Z1 from Elitas Travel for the price of $2,121,350. Despite its small size, it’s well-armoured and able to withstand up to three homing missiles.

6 Buckingham Howard NX-25

Based On The Hughes H-1 Racer

  • Top Speed - 327 km/h
  • Price - $1,296,750
  • Released - 1.41 Smuggler’s Run Update

Much like most Buckingham planes in GTA Online , the Buckingham Howard NX-25 is one of the smallest and sleekest on this ranking. Taking its design from one of the most iconic racing planes of all time, the Hughes H-1 Racer, it's one of the most interesting planes in the game.

With a top speed of 327 km/h (203 mph), the Buckingham Howard NX-25 is one of the most maneuverable planes in GTA Online , perfect for tricks and races. Players can purchase the Buckingham Howard NX-25 from Elitas Travel for $1,296,750.

5 V-65 Molotok

Based On The Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-15

  • Top Speed - 334 km/h
  • Price - $4,788,000
  • Released - 1.41 Smuggler’s Run Update

Based on another classic plane, the Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-15, the V-65 Molotok brings a historical style to GTA Online . With a top speed of 334 km/h (207 mph), the V-65 Molotok earns its place in the top five fastest planes.

Players can purchase the V-65 Molotok from Warstock Cache & Carry for the price of $4,788,000. This plane is, of course, weaponized with standard cannons and missile launchers. It's well-armored and can withstand up to three Homing Missiles before it's destroyed.

4 Mammoth Hydra

Based On The Harrier II

  • Top Speed - 336 km/h
  • Price - $3,990,000
  • Released - 1.21 Heist DLC Update

The Mammoth Hydra is perhaps the most well-known plane in GTA Online and Grand Theft Auto in general. It's popular for its VTOL (Vertical Take-Off and Landing) mode, allowing players to take off and land essentially anywhere in Lost Santos with little to no risk of crashing.

With a top speed of 336 km/h (209 mph), it's one of the fastest planes in GTA Online and Story Mode. It can be purchased from Warstock Cache & Carry for &3,990,00. Taking its design from the British Aerospace Harrier II, the Mammoth Hydra has the most iconic style in Grand Theft Auto .

3 Western Company Rogue

Based On The Beechcraft T-6 Texan II

  • Top Speed - 353 km/h
  • Price - $1,586,000
  • Released - 1.41 Smuggler’s Run Update

The Western Company Rogue is one of the best planes on this list for completing missions and traveling across the map with its combination of high speeds, weapons, armor, and two seats. With a top speed of 353 km/h (219 mph), it's the third-fastest plane in GTA Online and the second-fastest plane in GTA 5 Story Mode.

Its design takes inspiration from the Beechcraft T-6 Texan II, a trainer aircraft commonly used by the United States Air Force. Players can buy the Western Company Rogue from Warstock Cache & Carry for $1,586,000. It comes equipped with cannons, a missile launcher, and can be equipped with bombs for a more explosive touch.

2 Buckingham Pyro

Based On The De Havilland Vampire

  • Top Speed - 358 km/h
  • Price - $4,455,500
  • Released - 1.41 Smuggler’s Run Update

The Buckingham Pyro is the fastest plane in GTA 5 Story Mode and the second fastest in GTA Online . With two seats available, players can fly with friends across the map, making it an ideal choice for missions, heist setups, and general exploration. With a top speed of 358 km/h (222 mph), it can get players across Los Santos in no time.

The Buckingham Pyro can be purchased from Warstock Cache & Carry for $4,455,000, putting it on the expensive side of this ranking. Taking inspiration from the British Fighter Jet, the De Havilland Vampire, the Buckingham Pyro has the most unique design in GTA Online .

1 Mammoth F-160 Raiju

Based On The Lockheed Martin F-35 Lightning II

  • Top Speed - 374 km/h
  • Price - $6,855,000
  • Released - 1.67 Mercenaries Update

The Mammoth F-160 Raiju is the fastest plane in GTA Online , with a top speed of 374 km/h (232 mph). It comes with all the bells and whistles, like Stealth Mode and VTOL Mode, making it the ideal choice for combat, especially against enemy players.

It is the most expensive plane on this list, priced at $6,855,000, and available at Warstock Cache & Carry. Much like its real-life counterpart, the Lockheed Martin F-35 Lightning II, the Mammoth F-160 Raiju is well armored and weaponized.

item.title: Death Stranding 2 Couldn't Have Picked a Better Release Date
item.description:
Summary

  • Death Stranding 2 has an early summer release date of June 26, 2025, earlier than expected.
  • Summer releases like Death Stranding 2 can avoid competition from fall franchises and dominate quieter periods.
  • By releasing in June, Death Stranding 2 can draw more attention and avoid being overshadowed in a crowded 2025 gaming landscape.

2025 is packed with highly anticipated titles, several of which have already seen the light of day. Among that rather lengthy list of games is Death Stranding 2: On the Beach , the sequel to Hideo Kojima's 2019 action title that had such unique gameplay it might as well be its own genre. Announced in 2022, Death Stranding 2 has been several years coming, with only bits and pieces of information released about it since then. However, the long-awaited sequel has finally received a release date via its latest trailer, and it's actually arriving a lot sooner than many might have expected.

In the recent pre-order trailer for Death Stranding 2 , fans are treated to 10 minutes of footage detailing what will likely be a deeply emotional story, as well as some action-packed gameplay that attempts to rectify the "walking simulator" criticisms its predecessor received. While everything showcased in the trailer is enough to hype up even the lightest Death Stranding fans, one of the best parts of the trailer happens at the end, where an official release date of June 26, 2025 is revealed, and it couldn't have been a better pick.

Death Stranding 2 Picked the Perfect Release Date

Death Stranding 2's Early Summer Release Date Should Drive Engagement and Sales

While June is still a few months away, Death Stranding 2 's official release date is still much earlier than many fans likely anticipated. This is largely due to the fact that AAA games like Death Stranding 2 generally launch in the final quarter of the year, closer to the holidays. If they don't launch then, they typically opt for the first quarter of the year, if not just to avoid crowded holiday release windows and capitalize on the momentum left in the wake of those launch periods. Summer releases, however, are usually avoided by developers due to lower engagement and sales, but that has been changing in recent years.

Until recently, summer release windows were largely considered less desirable for video games, as the season usually means school is out and vacations are in. Now, more developers are beginning to embrace summer release windows, as it can mean avoiding competition from big fall franchises like Call of Duty and Assassin's Creed . As a result, summer releases have a chance to dominate an otherwise quiet period, and there is arguably no better title to do that in 2025 than Death Stranding 2 . With its reputation as one of the most highly anticipated games of the year, Death Stranding 2 is likely to steal the show this summer, with almost nothing around it that can compete with it.

The biggest game launching near Death Stranding 2 in 2025 is Elden Ring Nightreign , which launches on May 30, less than a month ahead of the Death Stranding sequel.

Death Stranding 2's Release Date Lets It Avoid the Crowd in 2025

When a game opts for a summer release date, it's going to avoid the Q1 and Q4 crowds anyway, but this is especially important for Death Stranding 2 . Since last year, when many developers began announcing 2025 release dates for their games, this year has become notorious for being one of the biggest years in gaming. With titles like Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 , Split Fiction , Assassin's Creed Shadows , and Monster Hunter Wilds all slated for launch in 2025, whether any game would be able to survive the shadow of every other release was and still is up in the air. This is where Death Stranding 2 has a big advantage, as its June release date allows it to avoid the crowd in 2025 and draw more attention to itself.

With its reputation as one of the most highly anticipated games of the year, Death Stranding 2 is likely to steal the show this summer, with almost nothing around it that can compete with it.

As anticipated as it may be, Death Stranding 2 could use that extra attention, as its predecessor was a bit divisive due to its unconventional gameplay mechanics and bizarre worldbuilding. That being said, Death Stranding 2 is taking strides to be more universally appealing than the first game was, and that can be seen in its renewed emphasis on combat and its automated deliveries. In any case, those who have been waiting for Death Stranding 2 will get to play it sooner than they probably expected they'd be able to, which is always a bonus.

item.title: Monopoly GO: Free Dice Roll Links (Updated Daily)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Free Monopoly GO Dice Links For Today
  • Expired Monopoly GO Dice Links
  • How to Redeem Dice Links in Monopoly GO
  • How To Get Free Dice Rolls In Monopoly Go

Monopoly GO is a fun board game that combines the classic Monopoly experience with cool additional features and a city-building element. In the game, players can move their pieces to earn money and then use that money to build new buildings, upgrade their houses, and much more. The ultimate goal is to drive other players into bankruptcy by acquiring all pieces of property, essentially creating a “monopoly.”

In Monopoly GO , players move according to the roll of dice they get, and the game proceeds with renting, trading, and buying properties. If players have finished their dice rolls and want to get some more, here’s how they can do it.

Updated by Umama Ali on March 12, 2025: Without dice, you can’t roll around the board, build landmarks, or participate in any tournaments. Running out of dice can slow down your progress in Monopoly GO, leaving you at a disadvantage compared to other players. With the release of Deluxe Drop, fans are looking for more dice rolls. We’ve updated this guide with a bunch of new links that offer free dice rolls so that you can keep building in Monopoly GO. Check back regularly to find new Monopoly GO dice links.

We discovered only one new dice link on March 12. You can find all the active Monopoly GO dice links in the table below.

Free Monopoly GO Dice Links For Today

While your dice rolls slowly replenish over time, you can use Dice Links to get free dice rolls instantly. Dice Links are a quick and easy way to grab free dice and keep the action going in Monopoly GO .

Here are all the active Monopoly GO dice links for March 2025 to help you participate in ongoing events and tournaments and complete boards easily.

Monopoly GO Dice Links

Date

25 x Dice Rolls

Mar 11 - Mar 14

25 x Dice Rolls

Mar 10 - Mar 13

25 x Dice Rolls

Mar 10 - Mar 13

25 x Dice Rolls

Mar 09 - Mar 12

25 x Dice Rolls

Mar 08 - Mar 11

30 x Dice Rolls

Mar 09 - Mar 16

Dice links can only be redeemed once per account . Additionally, links expire after a certain amount of time. If you click a link, and it says "This reward cannot be claimed", then that particular link is no longer valid.

Expired Monopoly GO Dice Links

  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls

How to Redeem Dice Links in Monopoly GO

To redeem these links, tycoons can follow these simple steps:

  • Open a link on your phone. This will launch the Monopoly GO app on your device.
  • All you need to do then is click 'Collect,' and you'll get dice rolls for free.

How To Get Free Dice Rolls In Monopoly Go

Login Daily

Like most mobile games nowadays, Monopoly GO also offers incentives for players so that they frequently play the game. One of the daily treats is free dice rolls, so logging in daily is one way to get them. In addition to dice rolls, players have the chance to win other exciting prizes as well.

Invite Friends

Monopoly GO offers generous rewards for players who successfully invite others to join the game. If a player invites a friend, and the invited friend joins the game, both of them get 30 extra rolls . Players can keep getting 30 free rolls for inviting up to 30 friends , given that they accept the invitation.

Collect Community Chest Rewards

Community chests are great because they offer a variety of rewards. Players can open these chests to earn money, and if they help a friend with a community chest, they can earn some free rolls.

To make the most out of the community chest, players must ensure that they have at least 9 active in-game friends.

Complete Sticker Albums

Players collect stickers throughout Monopoly GO , and they aren’t just a fun part of the game; they can help players get dice rolls , too. For every sticker set or album that players complete, they receive dice rolls. While the free rolls earned through sticker albums are more than those obtained after completing a set, the process of completing an album can be more time-consuming.

Participate in Events and Tournaments

If you want a bunch of dice rolls, consider participating in events and tournaments. The game introduces new events regularly, and by completing their milestones, you can claim dice rolls, different sticker packs, in-game money, and various other exciting prizes . Tournaments also pack a lot of stellar rewards, so players should aim to secure a high position on the tournament leaderboard to make the most of them.

Special Events

Apart from the main events and tournaments, Monopoly GO also has a number of special events. From Free Parking to Wheel Boost, the game offers many events to help you grab some dice rolls. However, their timings change every day, so you can check out our daily events schedule guide to know when they happen.
